title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-22] [$50] Payment - "Payment Complete" is not in Spanish.
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Login in any account
2. Change The language preference to Spanish
3. Go to workspace chat
4. Submit an expense
5. Click Pay elsewhere button in the expense preview on the main chat

Expected result: "Payment completed" should be in Spanish

Actual result: None
